title: Placing Text Boxes in Matplotlib
description: In data visualization, it is often necessary to add annotations to plots to provide additional information to the audience. One way to do this is by adding text boxes to a plot. In Matplotlib, it is possible to place text boxes in axes coordinates, so the text doesn't move around with changes in x or y limits. You can also use the bbox property of text to surround the text with a ~matplotlib.patches.Patch instance.

meta.title: Mastering Text Boxes in Matplotlib Visualizations
meta.description: Learn how to effectively place text boxes in Matplotlib plots to enhance data visualization and provide valuable insights.
meta.keywords: matplotlib, text boxes, python, data visualization, annotations
